message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take $6000 and you can have $4000.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the value of money is likely to decrease with each round.  Let's see if you're willing to work with me.
I'm not comfortable with a 55/45 split. I'd like to keep negotiating.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more. I'll take $4800 and you can have $5200.
